review: Doctor is really knowledgeable and friendly and gives clear explanation of the issue and the treatment plan. Highly recommend for kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Bharath is very friendly in nature, his treatment is  excellent, interaction with baby is so well , whenever he is not available in clinic also he responds us through WhatsApp and provide treatment , unnecessarily he never charge like other doctors. When our baby was detected dengue positive,he helped us with admitting to hospital, refering to a doctor and he was there in every stage until she recovered. Normally also after treating through WhatsApp or Call ,he keeps track on her until she recovers. Well recommend doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very nice doctor. 
My one year old baby got very high fever in the morning, suddenly it got worse by evening 104, we panicked and decided to take her to emergency but Dr.s there told us it's not safe to come as there are so many Covid patients admitted.  In this situation of Covid every where outside we took virtual appointment with Dr.  Bharat with the doubt in our mind that how he is going to diagnose the cause for fever on video call... But it was extremely satisfactory.  The explanation of doctor made us calm n relaxed and my baby was fine after 2 days of medication. Thanks dr Bharat for your genuine care towards my little one

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Acknowledged and answered all questions asked. Provides clear explanation about the issue. Very patiently handled the discussion. Generally, most doctors are hurried and don't care to cater to all doubts, but here, Doctor gives us enough time for discussion and examinataion. He also proactively offered wassup contact which rarely Doctors do and so far he has always replied to my messages. Finally, appointment charge is almost 50% less the normal market cost. So, I must say that both my husband and I had the best experience. Thanks

tags: Wait time,
review: Our appointment was at 6PM. We arrived at the clinic at 6:15PM. With a 7 months old baby it's usually impossible to arrive on time. When we reached the clinic, doctor was not there. Why have a slot open at 6PM if the doctor is not available at the clinic? Not just that, the nurse had to call the doctor to ask him to come to the clinic. He started inquiring the nurse what the visit was about. Since the nurse said it'd take him 5 mins to arrive. We went to the shop above the clinic. It had been 3 mins, and doctor arrived at the clinic. He didn't even have the patience to wait till the nurse to call. He just left the clinic. We came within a min of receiving the call. And the doctor was gone! Don't want to judge but if he really have to attend our baby we would've come the next day. Very rude!
reply_text: Our appointment was at 6 to 615pm. U have arrived at clinic at 6:40pm. Not at 6:15 pm. U didn’t have patience to wait for 3 minutes and went for shop.  And for ur information my appointments were closed after 630pm.we too have prior appointments. Anyway tc of ur child. Don’t give false information about ur arrivial to clinic

review:
Doctor was very friendly and cooperative . My child was suffering from abdominal pain and loose stool and was not able to express it , Dr.Bharath's suggestion and medication was very good. He was calm and not in a hurry , he took his time and even our child was comfortable. And also he was available on time at the given appointment , didn't have to wait for long.
I would recommend him 9/10 times for consulting a child , as he knows well how to comfort a child and also do his work at the same time .
